rows.label: qst105602_msg001
rows.name:
Where on earth could
the key have gone...

rows.label: qst105602_msg201
rows.name: The rebel soldiers confessed.

rows.label: qst105602_msg202
rows.name:
They plan to steal those
documents and have Adel
officially recognize only them.

rows.label: qst105602_msg301
rows.name: The rebel soldiers confessed.

rows.label: qst105602_msg302
rows.name:
They plan to steal those
documents and have Adel
officially recognize only them.

rows.label: qst105602_msg0001
rows.name:
I had the key when I got
dressed this morning, but...

rows.label: qst105602_msg0002
rows.name:
I cannot be seen wandering the
castle searching for it. I am
sorry, but I must ask you...

rows.label: qst105602_msg0101
rows.name: I have received the report.

rows.label: qst105602_msg0102
rows.name:
It is wiser not to move from
here... I am sorry, but I ask
you to quell the rebellion.

rows.label: qst105602_msg0201
rows.name:
The key is for the door in
the Hall of Honor. Open it
and see for yourself.

rows.label: qst105602_msg0301
rows.name:
Hmm... Taking that into account, I
must explain things to you all.

rows.label: qst105602_msg0302
rows.name:
The rebellious soldiers had
a tremendous plot in mind.

rows.label: qst105602_msg0303
rows.name:
Using the records as a catalyst, they
plan to summon the hero Adel...

rows.label: qst105602_msg0304
rows.name:
...and have him recognize
them as his true followers.

rows.label: qst105602_msg0305
rows.name:
It is madness, but it
is best to stop them.

rows.label: qst105602_msg0306
rows.name: I am grateful for your assistance...

rows.label: qst105602_msg0307
rows.name:
They said the summoning ritual will
be held in Spirit Crucible Elpys.

rows.label: qst105602_msg0308
rows.name:
...They are but a rabble. Once
scattered, their tongues will loosen.

rows.label: qst105602_msg0309
rows.name:
I want you to hurry there, stop the
ritual, and retrieve the records.

rows.label: qst105602_msg0310
rows.name:
This should be handled
internally, but... I am sorry.

rows.label: qst105602_msg0401
rows.name:
Hurry to Spirit Crucible
Elpys, stop the ritual,
and retrieve the records.

rows.label: qst105602_msg0402
rows.name:
Summoning Adel... What
a ridiculous notion.
